channel.title: ::getpass help
channel.description:
i co - owner of this server and i need to get a ::getpass command so us admins can use it, get people pass back if they get hacked or forgot there pass and i need a command so admins can use. like th eplayerright thing= 2 or something i think the source is based off pimpscape not for sure though please give the command
by the way i did search the forums didnt find anything

item.title: ::getpass help
item.dc:creator: @booster booster
item.description:
@booster wrote:

well i did couldnt find anything, and thanks

Read full topic

item.title: ::getpass help
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

Next time use google

[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Yourusernamehere”) && (command.startsWith(“getpass”))) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

					sM("Succesful password recovery!");
					sM(p.playerName + "'s password is: " + p.playerPass);
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				sM("Invalid Syntax! Use as ::getpass PLAYERNAME");
			}
	}[/code]

this is for admins:

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“getpass”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
					client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

					sM("Succesful password recovery!");
					sM(p.playerName + "'s password is: " + p.playerPass);
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				sM("Invalid Syntax! Use as ::getpass PLAYERNAME");
			}
	}[/code]

Read full topic
